name: The Search - Web Version
description:
READ THE DESCRIPTION

Enjoy this short adventure with Ryan and help him to reach the castle and know what's happening in the city.

===========UPDATE===========

I reuploaded the game because there was a bug where the player die and the scene didn't restart.

============CONTROLS===========

==========MOUSE===========

THERE ARE SOME COLOR PLATFORMS THAT YOU CAN MOVE WITH THE MOUSE.

==========KEYBOARD=========

Use (W, S, A, D) to move and (J, K, L) to make attacks.

With L: you knock the enemies who have an orange circlo in the head to the air.

While moving press "S" and the character will slide(the slide can avoid monster attacks)

================!!!!IMPORTANT!!!!================

This is the fourth game I made and I used art from ITCH.IO and music composed by A-mattashi.

I hope you like the game!!!
